title: Out-of-bounds Read
overview: `stringstream` allocates uninitialized Buffers when number is passed in input stream on Node.js 4.x and below
author: Сковорода Никита Андреевич (https://github.com/ChALkeR)
recommendation:
No fix is currently available for this vulnerability.

It is our recommendation to not install or use this module at this time.
